timeline.bodyText:
It's always used in case of "new table", but the data is expected or not to exists, so isNewData would be appreopriate.
However, this method is just a check, it's not supposed to return anything other than new Path(location).
So I propose

in case of CTAS, do not call it
in case of CT, call it, but change the method signature: -> checkExternalPath(HdfsContext, Path)
